high_co2_emission.description: The CO2 levels are high in this area. This could be due to industrial emissions, transportation, and other human activities.
solutions: Reduce fossil fuel consumption by using renewable energy sources.
Promote electric vehicles and public transportation.
Implement carbon capture and storage technologies.

high_methane_emission.description: The methane levels are elevated, possibly due to agriculture, waste management, or fossil fuel extraction.
solutions: Implement better waste management techniques to reduce methane emissions from landfills.
Improve agricultural practices, including better livestock management.
Capture methane from oil and gas production using methane capture technologies.

high_no2_emission.description: High NO2 concentrations are typically caused by vehicle emissions and industrial activities.
solutions: Encourage the use of electric vehicles.
Reduce industrial emissions by implementing stricter regulations.
Encourage carpooling and public transportation to reduce traffic.
